meanings.definition: No longer fashionable or in current use.
meanings.sent1: Her passee dress stood out at the modern party.
meanings.sent2: The passee technology was replaced by newer models.
meanings.sent3: The passee hairstyle made her look like a character from a different era.
meanings.sent4: His passee taste in music was like listening to a time capsule.
meanings.sent5: The passee trend faded away as quickly as it came.

meanings.sent1: The passee furniture in the antique shop caught her eye.
meanings.sent2: His passee manners reminded her of her grandparents.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a passee hat, he looked like he stepped out of a history book.
meanings.sent4: The passee car chugged along the road, drawing curious glances.
meanings.sent5: The passee style of architecture gave the town a nostalgic charm.

meanings.definition: Past one's prime or no longer relevant.
meanings.sent1: The passee athlete struggled to keep up with the younger competitors.
meanings.sent2: Her passee skills were no match for the modern demands of the job.
meanings.sent3: The passee technology seemed like a relic from a forgotten era.
meanings.sent4: His passee ideas were quickly dismissed in the fast-paced meeting.
meanings.sent5: The passee building stood as a reminder of a bygone era.
